Government of Canada
Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions
Procurement Notice
20230293 RFP - Rotary Chairs

Introduction
----------------

The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the terms of the Public Services and Procurement Canada Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H for the procurement of Rotary Chairs.

Notice Details
--------------

* **Request ID**: cb-6034-79938664
* **Publication Date**: June 1, 2023
* **Closing Date**: June 14, 2023 at 14:00:00 EST
* **Contract Start Date**: June 30, 2023
* **Contract End Date**: September 29, 2023

Description
------------

This RFP covers a requirement for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating (Rotary Chairs) to 255 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario and 121 King Street, Toronto, Ontario.

Eligibility
------------

Only suppliers who are pre-qualified and have been issued a Supply Arrangement (SA) are eligible to bid. Suppliers who are not SA holders can submit a bid to the Identified User (IU) but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation. If awarded, a contract will only be issued once the SA has been issued to the supplier for the products and services contained in the bid.

Procurement Method
------------------

This procurement will be conducted using the Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H and the trade agreements listed in the RFP documents.

Inquiries
----------

Please direct all inquiries to Alanna Duncan, Contracting Authority, at alanna.duncan@osfi-bsif.gc.ca or (343) 573-0389.

Attachments
------------

The complete RFP package may be found at the following link:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6034/rfp_20230293_chairs_e.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6034/rfp_20230293_chairs_mod001.pdf>

Contact Information
------------------

For any questions or concerns, please contact:
Alanna Duncan
Contracting Authority
Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions
255 Albert Street, 12th Floor
Ottawa, ON
